items.name: Goan Khatkhate
items.description: A comforting spiced vegetarian dish cooked with lentils, coconut, spices and kokum
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Prawns Curry
items.description: A flavorful dish made with succulent prawns simmered in a fragrant blend of spices and coconut milk, creating a rich and creamy curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sabudana Punglu
items.description: A deep-fried snack made from soaked and seasoned sago pearls mixed with mashed potatoes, herbs, and spices, creating crispy and flavorful fritters. (8 pieces)

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comforting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Plantain Curry
items.description: A delicious dish made with plantains (raw banana) that are cooked in a flavorful blend of spices, such as turmeric, cumin, and coriander, along with onions, tomatoes, coconut.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kube Sukke
items.description: Mangalorean dish where fresh clams are cooked with aromatic spices, coconut, and a tangy tamarind base, creating a flavorful and lip-smacking seafood curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bondas
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made by deep-frying a batter of mashed potatoes, onions, and spices, resulting in crispy and flavorful fritters. (4 bonda)

items.name: Bisi Bele Bhaat
items.description: A comforting meal with veggies, lentils, garlic and bisli masala topped with curry leaves and ghee.

items.name: Chana Madra
items.description: A popular Himachali dish featuring chickpeas cooked in a rich and creamy yogurt gravy, flavored with aromatic spices like cumin, cloves, and cinnamon, resulting in a delightful and comforting vegetarian curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Pahadi Chicken
items.description: Chicken curry cooked with ginger, fennel, garlic, onions, yogurt  with fresh roasted masala
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ragada Patice
items.description: Mashed potatoes patty crispy fried and served with green pea churry smiriled with tangy, sweet and spicy chutney. (2 patice)

items.name: Baigan Bharta
items.description: A traditional Indian dish where roasted eggplant is mashed and cooked with a blend of aromatic spices, tomatoes, onions, and garlic, creating a smokey and flavorful vegetarian delight. Served with 2 roti.

items.name: Kabuli Chana pulao
items.description: A flavorful rice dish where aromatic basmati rice is cooked with tender chickpeas, aromatic spices, and fragrant herbs, creating a delicious and satisfying one-pot meal. Served with side of yogurt raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with chillies, garlic, ginger and freshly ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Veg Pot Rice
items.description: A wholesome and nutritious dish made with a variety of colorful vegetables, fragrant rice, and aromatic spices, all cooked together in a single pot, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying vegetarian meal

items.name: Chicken Pot Rice
items.description: A one-pot meal that combines succulent chicken, fragrant rice, and a medley of vegetables, cooked together in a flavorful broth, resulting in a hearty and satisfying dish.

items.name: Papadi Chaat
items.description: A popular street food of India. Mini puris topped with mashed potato, onion, tomato, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy tamrind chutney, lots of sev and fresh coriander. A dish with a flavour bomb!

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Plantain Kalan
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish made with pantain (raw banana) and yogurt, simmered in a coconut-based gravy with a hint of tanginess from tamarind, offering a creamy and mildly spiced dish
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Meen Mulakittathu
items.description: A traditional Kerala-style fish curry made with a tangy and spicy red chili-based gravy. The dish is made with tamarind pulp, coconut oil, and a blend of spices, creating a flavorful and fiery curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Rava Appam
items.description: South Indian pancakes made with a batter primarily composed of semolina (rava) and yogurt. The batter is seasoned with spices, such as cumin seeds and curry leaves.

items.name: Vagerela Bhaat
items.description: A popular Indian rice dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with a medley of vegetables, spices, on a tawa (griddle). It is seasoned with aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, and turmeric, resulting in a flavorful and colorful rice preparation.

items.name: Chanayachi Ussal
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made with chickpeas cooked in a flavorful tempering of spices, onions, tomatoes, and coconut, resulting in a protein-rich and aromatic curry
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kolambi Masala
items.description: A flavorful Maharashtrian dish made with prawns cooked in a spicy and tangy tomato-based gravy. The prawns are marinated with a blend of spices and then simmered in the masala, and a combination of spices, resulting in a delicious and aromatic prawn curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dhokla
items.description: Dhokla is a traditional Gujarati dish made from a batter of chickpea flour, rice flour and yogurt. Steamed and then cut into small, square pieces.

items.name: Kichidi
items.description: A comforting and wholesome Indian dish made by cooking rice and lentils together with a variety of spices. It is tempered with ghee (clarified butter) and flavored with cumin, turmeric, and other spices.

items.name: Rangoon Na Vaal
items.description: A dish from Gujarat made by cooking whole broad beans with carom seeds, chilli and tamarind in spicy tomato onion based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Tariwala Murg
items.description: Chicken thigh with drumsticks marinated with ginger-garlic paste and other spices cooked in flavourful gravy of onion and tomato. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Mirchi Bhajji
items.description: Green chilli peppers dipped in a batter of chickpea flour and spices and deep fried for a crispy texture. Served with some spicy green chutney. (6 bhajji)

items.name: Paneer Paratha
items.description: Indian cottage cheese mixed with different spices and chilles stuffed inside whole wheat flatbread and cooked on a pan. Served with achar + yogurt. (2 parathas)

items.name: Shukto
items.description: A traditional Bengali dish that is a unique blend of vegetables, including bitter gourd, plantain and drumsticks, cooked in a mustard-poppy seed paste-based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Bengali Chicken Biryani
items.description: A flavorful rice dish made with basmati rice, tender chicken pieces marinated in spices, aromatic herbs, and a blend of Bengali spices like garam masala and whole spices. The rice and chicken are layered and cooked together, resulting in a fragrant and delicious biryani. Served with raita + achar + papad

items.name: Sindhi Koki
items.description: Whole wheat flour mixed with gram flour, onions, chillies, sesame seeds and other spices, pan cooked into a flatbread. Served with onion-tomato chutney. (2 koki)

items.name: Mumbai Style Kheema Pav
items.description: A popular street food dish from Mumbai. It features spiced minced chicken cooked with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices. Served with 2 pav

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Indo-Chinese stir fry made with assorted veggies and chicken and cooked together with rice and noodles in flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Galawati Kabab
items.description: A succulent and melt-in-your-mouth kebab dish from Lucknow, India. It is made by marinating minced lamb with a mixture of aromatic spices, raw papaya, and yogurt. The meat is then shaped into patties and cooked on a griddle until tender and flavorful, resulting in incredibly soft and flavorful kebab. (3 kebab)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala
